00054 #define MIN_PACKET_LENGTH       42
00055 
00059 #define MAX_SESSIONS 256
00060 
00064 static u_char active_sessions[MAX_SESSIONS];
00065 
00069 static util_hash_function_t *hash;
00070

00084 /*============================================================================*/
00085 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */

00087 
00088 void lnp_listen_link() {
00089         int session_from;
00090         static u_char packet_data[LIBFREEDOM_FTU];
00091         int packet_length;
00092         
00093         hash = util_get_hash("sha1"); 
00094         
00095         while (1) {
00096                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "listening in link layer.");
00097                 packet_length = link_interface->link_read(&session_from, packet_data,
00098                                 LIBFREEDOM_FTU);
00099                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet with %d bytes received.",
00100                                 packet_length);
00101                 if (packet_length < 0) {
00102                         liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error receiving data.");
00103                         return;
00104                 }
00105                 if (packet_length < MIN_PACKET_LENGTH) {
00106                         liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "packet is too small to be valid.");
00107                         continue;
00108                 }
00109                 handle_packet(packet_data, packet_length, session_from);                
00110         }
00111         return;
00112 }
00113 /******************************************************************************/
00114 int lnp_link_write(u_char *packet_data, int packet_length) {
00115         return handle_packet(packet_data, packet_length, -1);
00116 }
00117 /******************************************************************************/
00118 void lnp_link_close_handler(int session) {
00119         /* TODO: Confirmar a não-necessidade de mutex em 'active_sessions'*/
00120         if (active_sessions[session]) {
00121                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "session %d closed.", session);
00122         }
00123         active_sessions[session] = 0;
00124 }
00125 /******************************************************************************/
00126 void lnp_link_connect_handler(int session) {
00127         if (!active_sessions[session]) {
00128                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "session %d opened.", session);
00129         }
00130         active_sessions[session] = 1;
00131 }
00132 /******************************************************************************/
00133 u_char lnp_is_session_active(int session) {
00134         return active_sessions[session];
00135 }
00136 
00137 /*============================================================================*/
00138 /* Private functions implementations.                                         */
00139 /*============================================================================*/
00140 
00141 int handle_packet(u_char *packet_data, int packet_length, int session_from) {
00142         u_char packet_hash[COLLISION_HASH_LENGTH];
00143         lnp_packet_p packet;
00144         int parse_result;
00145         int session_to;
00146         static int hash_offset = 3 * sizeof(u_char) + 2 * NET_ID_LENGTH;
00147         
00148         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet received from session %d.", session_from);
00149         
00150         parse_result = parse_packet(&packet, packet_data, packet_length);
00151         if (parse_result == LNP_ERROR) {
00152                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "packet couldn't be parsed.");
00153                 return LNP_ERROR;
00154         }
00155         packet.content = &packet_data[hash_offset];
00156         
00157         hash->function(packet_hash, packet.content, 
00158                         packet_length - hash_offset);
00159         
00160         session_to = lnp_routing_handle(packet.source, packet.destination,
00161                         packet_hash, packet.flags, session_from);
00162         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "session_to %d.", session_to);
00163                         
00164         if (session_to >= 0) {
00165                 return send_unicast(session_to, packet_data, packet_length);
00166         } else {
00167                 switch (session_to) {
00168                         case LNP_ROUTE_RECEIVE:
00169                                 return receive_packet(&packet, packet_length - hash_offset);
00170                         case LNP_ROUTE_BACK:
00171                                 return send_back(session_from, packet_data, packet_length);
00172                         case LNP_ROUTE_BACK_WITH_ERROR:
00173                                 /* TODO : checar*/
00174                                 send_broadcast(session_from, packet_data, packet_length);
00175                                 return send_back_with_error(session_from, packet_data, 
00176                                                 packet_length);
00177                         case LNP_ROUTE_BROADCAST:
00178                                 return send_broadcast(session_from, packet_data, packet_length);
00179                         case LNP_ROUTE_DROP:
00180                                 /* do nothing */
00181                                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet droped.");
00182                                 return LNP_OK;
00183                         default:
00184                                 return LNP_ERROR;
00185                 }
00186         }
00187 }
00188 /******************************************************************************/
00189 int parse_packet(lnp_packet_p *packet, u_char *packet_data, int packet_length) {
00190         UTIL_READ_START(packet_data, packet_length, LNP_OK, LNP_ERROR)
00191         UTIL_READ_BYTE (packet->type)
00192         UTIL_READ_BYTE (packet->ttl)
00193         UTIL_READ_BYTES(packet->source, NET_ID_LENGTH)
00194         UTIL_READ_BYTES(packet->destination, NET_ID_LENGTH)
00195         UTIL_READ_BYTE (packet->flags)
00196         UTIL_READ_END
00197 }
00198 /******************************************************************************/
00199 int receive_packet(lnp_packet_p *packet, int content_length) {
00200         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet is mine. type=%d.", packet->type);
00201         switch (packet->type) {
00202                 case LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_REQUEST:
00203                         lnp_handle_public_key_request(packet, content_length);
00204                         break;
00205                 case LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_RESPONSE:
00206                         lnp_handle_public_key_response(packet, content_length);
00207                         break;
00208                 case LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE:
00209                         lnp_handle_key_exchange(packet, content_length);
00210                         break;
00211                 case LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE_OK:
00212                         lnp_handle_key_exchange_ok(packet, content_length);
00213                         break;
00214                 case LNP_DATA:
00215                         lnp_handle_data(packet, content_length);
00216                         break;
00217                 default:
00218                         return LNP_ERROR;
00219         }
00220         return LNP_OK;
00221 }               
00222 /******************************************************************************/                
00223 int send_broadcast(int last_session, u_char *packet, int length) {
00224         int i;
00225         int return_value = LNP_ERROR;
00226         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "broadcasting.");
00227         for (i = 0; i < MAX_SESSIONS; i++) {
00228                 if ((active_sessions[i]) && (i != last_session)) {
00229                         if (send_packet(i, packet, length) == LNP_OK) {
00230                                 return_value = LNP_OK;
00231                         }
00232                 }
00233         }
00234         return return_value;
00235 }
00236 /******************************************************************************/                
00237 int send_back(int last_session, u_char *packet, int length) {
00238         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "sending back.");
00239         return send_packet(last_session, packet, length);
00240 }
00241 /******************************************************************************/                
00242 int send_back_with_error(int last_session, u_char *packet, int length) {
00243         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "sending back with error.");
00244         // TODO: setar bit de erro
00245         return send_packet(last_session, packet, length);
00246 }
00247 /******************************************************************************/                
00248 int send_unicast(int link_session, u_char *packet, int length) {
00249         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "sending unicast.");
00250         // TODO: tirar ttl
00251         return send_packet(link_session, packet, length);
00252 }
00253 /******************************************************************************/                
00254 int send_packet(int link_session, u_char *packet, int length) {
00255         int return_value;
00256         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "sending packet to %d: %d bytes", 
00257                         link_session, length);
00258         return_value = link_interface->link_write(link_session, packet, length);
00259         
00260         if (return_value == LINK_ERROR) {
00261                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet wasn't sent.");
00262         }
00263         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet was sent.");
00264         
00265         return (return_value == LINK_ERROR ? LNP_ERROR : LNP_OK);
00266 }
00267 /******************************************************************************/
